Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Leviathan Drive, east of the Shrine of Corellon Larethian.
Room.LongDescription: The Elven Shrine of Corellon Larethian is used by all elves of the forests in the surrounding lands, and even on the other islands. Corellon Larethian is the elven god of everything that is, and this magnificent shrine is dedicated to his greatness.
